description:
Usopp`s ill-advised attempt at bravery threatens to get him killed, but a familiar foot spares the sniper`s life. Luffy struggles to even strike a formidable foe, and Franky races to deliver some very important keys!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hunter Sanji Makes an Entrance? Elegy for a Lying Wolf
Kariudo Sanji Toujou? Usotsuki Ookami ni Okuru Banka
Sanji, le chasseur ! Un dernier poème pour le loup menteur
Волкодав Санджи? Элегия для лживого волка
ظهور الصّيّاد سانجي؟ مرثاة على ذئب كاذب
狩人サンジ登場? 嘘つき狼に贈る挽歌
